settings.image_heading: The Perfect Gifts for Creators & Productivity
settings.Imgsub_heading: Get the best gifts on tech for boosting your creative process including our powerful GaN chargers, battery packs, thunderbolt docks, and hubs for MacBook and PC. It’s the best time of year to upgrade your setup and go beyond your devices’ limitations.

settings.heading: Charge Anything, Anywhere, & Anytime
settings.subheading: Perfect for those who create on the move, the 245W USB-C Battery Pack delivers 4 ports of up to 100W charging power for simultaneous portable charging.

settings.heading: Charge Your MacBook Pro to 50% in 30 Minutes
settings.subheading: Streamline charging with 3 ports of up to 140W PD 3.1 charging ability that takes advantage of GaN’s compact technology. Ensure all your devices are fully charged in no time.

settings.heading: MagSafe Charging for Your New iPhone
settings.subheading: With both wireless and USB-C connected charging for two devices, the MagSafe Compatible Wireless Battery Pack is a great gift for charging the on-the-go.

settings.heading: Mini Size & Max Power for MacBook Air, iPhone, and iPad
settings.subheading: Quickly charge iPhone 15, MacBook Air, and any other device using two USB-C Ports with our super-compact 35W GaN Charger.

settings.heading: Supercharge Your Desktop and Mobile Power
settings.subheading: Never stop creating, working, or playing. The power you need to charger all your devices at once, at the fastest speeds possible.

settings.heading: Triple 4K Extended Monitors for M1, M2, & M3 MacBook Pro
settings.subheading: View it all with extended 4K displays and all the pro-grade ports you need, in a sleek and ergonomic design.

settings.heading: Dual 4K Extended Monitors  for M1, M2 & M3 MacBook
settings.subheading: Extend two displays at 4K resolutions while getting access to 7 pro-grade ports including a 100W PD power pass-through port.

settings.heading: Dual 4K Monitors for PC with 40Gbps USB4 Speed
settings.subheading: Features integrated HDMI 2.1 and DisplayPort 1.4 for single 8K30Hz display support on SST and MST devices and dual 4K60Hz display support on MST enabled devices.

settings.heading: Triple Extended Display Support for PC and Chromebook
settings.subheading: This powerful and minimalist USB-C Dock features driverless plug and play triple extended display support to deliver an incredibly versatile connectivity solution for efficient multi-tasking.

settings.heading: Get Up to Triple 4K Extended Monitors and Every Port You Need
settings.subheading: Getting a new M3 MacBook Pro or upgrading your current setup? We have what you need to boost your creative process, gaming setup, or productivity flow. Check out our hubs and docks for MacBook, PC, and Chromebook.

settings.heading: The Ultimate Thunderbolt 4 Bundle for Creatives and Gamers
settings.subheading: The only dock you need for work and play. Get 40Gbps transfer speeds, dual monitor support, 96W of power delivery, and a premium Thunderbolt 4 cable.

settings.heading: Sleek & Powerful Thunderbolt 4 Hub  with 3 Downstream Ports
settings.subheading: The Thunderbolt 4 Power Hub with no bulky powe brick for a cleaner workspace while still providing 40Gbps data transfers and dual 4K60Hz or single 8K30Hz display connectivity.

settings.heading: Thunderbolt 4 Cable for Charging and 40Gbps Speed
settings.subheading: Perfect for speed and charging with 40Gbps transfers, 8K display support, and 100W power delivery, making it perfect for creative professionals.

settings.heading: Compact Thunderbolt Anywhere You Go
settings.subheading: Perfect for speed and charging with 40Gbps transfers, 8K display support, and 100W power delivery, making it perfect for creative professionals.

settings.heading: The Ultimate Thunderbolt Dock Deals
settings.subheading: Work and create from anywhere with 40Gbps speeds and dual 4K60Hz displays, in a super-portable size.
